unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: The Meaning of Probability
question_text: Which of the following provides the best definition of “the probability of event $A$ ”?

choices.text: The number of times that event A A will occur in a large number of observations or trials
The number of times that event A A will occur in a series of 100 100 observations or trials
The proportion of times that event A A will occur in 100 100 observations or trials
The proportion of times that event A A will occur in a very large number of observations or trials
A decimal between 0 0 and 1 1 OR a percentage between 0 % 0 % and 100 % 100 % .
